citation.article-title: Reclassification of the members of the genus Tetrathiobacter Ghosh et al. 2005 to the genus Advenella Coenye et al. 2005
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Advenella Coenye et al. 2005

Advenella (Ad.ven.el′la. L. n. advena a stranger, a foreigner; L. dim. ending -ella; N.L. fem. n. Advenella the little stranger, referring to the fact that the source of the first strains was unknown).
The description is as given by Coenye et al. (2005) with the following modifications.
Some members of the genus do not assimilate dl-lactate, d-mannose or maltose.
The type species is Advenella incenata.
